Package Inter.IntChessBoard

Interface IntChessBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChessBoard
public interface IntChessBoard
An interface representing a chessboard for managing positions and validity checks.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    validPosition(String input)
    Method to verify the validity of a piece's position represented by a string input.
    boolean
    verifyCoordinate(char LocationX, int LocationY)
    Method to verify the validity of the X and Y coordinates of a piece.
    boolean
    verifyCoordinate(int LocationY)
    Method to verify the validity of the Y-coordinate of a piece.

  • Method Details

    • verifyCoordinate

      boolean verifyCoordinate(int LocationY)
      Method to verify the validity of the Y-coordinate of a piece.
      Parameters:
      LocationY - The Y-coordinate to be verified
      Returns:
      true if the Y-coordinate is valid, false otherwise

    • verifyCoordinate

      boolean verifyCoordinate(char LocationX, int LocationY)
      Method to verify the validity of the X and Y coordinates of a piece.
      Parameters:
      LocationX - The X-coordinate to be verified
      LocationY - The Y-coordinate to be verified
      Returns:
      true if both X and Y coordinates are valid, false otherwise

    • validPosition

      boolean validPosition(String input)
      Method to verify the validity of a piece's position represented by a string input.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string representing the position to be verified
      Returns:
      true if the position is valid, false otherwise
